content.html: The idea of banning social transition is such a horrifying next step What does that even mean? Why should the state be able to define what is acceptable social behavior or gender expression? What will happen with people who aren't trans but don't conform to gender norms?
content.value:
The idea of banning social transition is such a horrifying next step

What does that even mean?
Why should the state be able to define what is acceptable social behavior or gender expression?

What will happen with people who aren't trans but don't conform to gender norms?
